Package us.ullberg.startpunkt.graphql

Class I18nGraphQLResource

java.lang.Object
us.ullberg.startpunkt.graphql.I18nGraphQLResource
@GraphQLApi @ApplicationScoped public class I18nGraphQLResource extends Object
GraphQL API resource for internationalization (i18n). Provides queries for retrieving translations in different languages.

      @Query("translations") @Description("Retrieve translations for a specific language") public String getTranslations(@NonNull @Name("language") @Description("Language code (e.g., en-US, de-DE)") @NonNull String language)
